Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Variationen über den Sehnsuchtswalzer von Franz Schubert, Anh. F24

c. 1831–1834

The set, which is incomplete, comprises an introduction and five variations on a dance (D 365 no. 2) by Franz Schubert, with a ritornello between each of the variations. Schumann re-used the introduction in the Préambule from Carnaval (op. 9).

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/7 · RSA 1022 [in preparation]
  • Friedrich Hofmeister · FH 2773 · ed. Andreas Boyde [with completion by Andreas Boyde]

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
